tactics.name: Keyword Research & Book Analysis
tactics.description: Identify low competition keywords, analyze top-ranking KDP books, and create unique content by combining elements from successful titles.
steps: Identify keywords with niche scores 45+ and low total results
Analyze top-ranking books' covers, descriptions, and interiors
Use templates from Tangent or Creative Fabrica for design
Avoid copied content by creating unique value propositions
caveats: Avoid dedicated copyright pages that irritate customers
source_quotes: Customers get irritated when seeing copyright pages...

tactics.name: keyword_niche_analysis
tactics.description: Use Chrome extensions to analyze keyword niches and identify low-competition opportunities
steps: Check keyword Niche scores and total results
Look for recently published books with high BSR rankings
Extract keywords from titles for additional research
caveats: Verify trademark status for terms like 'Bunko'
source_quotes: this Niche has a growing demand and a growing amount of books being published in there

tactics.name: bsr_filter
tactics.description: Filter books sold by Amazon using BSR scores to identify low-competition niches
source_quotes: sold by Amazon but just focus on log books

tactics.name: interior_analysis
tactics.description: Use book interiors as inspiration for content structure and customer targeting
source_quotes: help to organize things and make it easier for the customer

tactics.name: simple_kdp_interior_design
tactics.description: Create a minimalist interior layout for KDP books using Canva
caveats: When design fails to meet formatting requirements
source_quotes: the interior is really really simple so in this case if it is over 100 Pages which it is usually they have a gpg or PNG format which I can upload to canva as a single upload and make the sizing correct which is usually an 8.5 times 11 and then I would upload that to canva and make a couple of changes and it would be good to go

heuristics.name: Review Analysis Heuristic
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize boosting content quality

heuristics.name: low_competition_signal
heuristics.condition: If keyword_niche_score is below 50 and total_results under 5000, prioritize
source_quotes: this Niche is one of the most easiest niche is that I've seen so far

heuristics.name: review_threshold
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize niche
source_quotes: this one here says return Lorry says it has been returned why because every page is the same

claims.statement: Amazon KDP books with dedicated copyright pages may irritate customers
source_quotes: Customers most of their complaints is that they get irritated...

claims.statement: Home renovation planner has 450 total results under 500
source_quotes: home renovation planner and it currently has a keyword underscore of 43 and the total results a really outstanding 450

claims.statement: Amazon allows customization of templates despite platform limitations
source_quotes: you do want to make some changes some simple things such as adding some elements

claims.statement: Canva is used for KDP interior design formatting
source_quotes: upload that to canva and make a couple of changes and it would be good to go

niche_patterns.example: intermittent fasting logbook + tracking fasting + low competition
niche_patterns.description: Combine a specific identity with a problem-solving approach in a low-competition niche
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Leverages high demand for tracking tools while avoiding saturated markets
source_quotes: This keyword can expand to so many other keywords...

niche_patterns.example: Bunko game + scorekeeping tool + interior design
niche_patterns.description: Target specific game-related tools with cross-niche applications
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines game-specific utility with broader interior design appeal
source_quotes: this Niche does expand to other sub niches and they have much better keyword in each score
